info.title: OpenDI Decision Modeling API
info.description:
This WIP API specification intends to define standard endpoints that OpenDI-compliant systems are expected to provide or utilize.  
This specification's primary goal is to align an ecosystem of vendors, researchers, educators, and other users around a shared interoperability framework.



This API largely concerns [Causal Decision Models](api/models.tag.mdx) and other related data structures used to model, simulate, and visualize decisions.

## More info

 For more on the motivation behind this effort, see the OpenDI homepage.  
[View Resource >>](https://opendi.org/)

For information about the roles and user stories that this API specification supports, see OpenDI Roles and User Stories.  
[View Resource >>](http://roles-user-stories.opendi.org/)

get.description:
Find a model by its UUID. Returns a reduced model JSON, with evaluatables and diagrams given as a list of IDs.

For evaluatable and diagram retrieval, see:  
- [/evaluatables/{evaluatableId}](api/retrieve-an-evaluatable-component.api.mdx)
- [/diagrams/{diagramId}](api/retrieve-a-diagram-component.api.mdx)
Find a model by its UUID. Returns the complete model JSON, including all evaluatables and diagrams.

Get a list of model components (diagram and evaluatable) the user has permission to access.

Results include all types of components, marked with a `componentType` field:

- `diagram`: See [Retrieve a Diagram](./retrieve-a-diagram-component)
- `evaluatable`: See [Retrieve an evaluatable](./retrieve-an-evaluatable-component)

**NOTE: This proposed endpoint is an aggregate collection, returning a list of instances from multiple resource types.**  
We're not yet sure if this is a good idea! If you have thoughts or feedback about common functionality that would justify this sort of aggregate collection, talk to us about it!
